snippet: The timing of National Doughnut Day may not have been ideal for Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, who has proposed restricting the sales of super-size sugary drinks.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg declares June 1 'NYC Donut Day,' in homage to National Donut Day; proclamation comes one day after he proposed restricting the sales of super-size sugary drinks to fight obesity, underscoring arguments that some of city's public health policies are inconsistent.
lead_paragraph: The timing of National Doughnut Day may not have been ideal for Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, who has proposed restricting the sales of super-size sugary drinks.

headline.seo: On ‘National Donut Day,’ Some Find Mixed Messages From Bloomberg
headline.main: Looking at Bloomberg’s Soda Ban Through a Doughnut Hole
headline.print_headline: Looking at Bloomberg’s Soda Ban Through a Doughnut Hole
